size.$description: tooltip.arrow.size — Tooltip arrow size (7px). Small arrow points toward the trigger element for visual connection.

borderRadius.$description: tooltip.borderRadius — Tooltip border radius (4px). Subtle rounding softens the tooltip without appearing overly styled.

fontSize.$description: tooltip.fontSize — Tooltip font size (12px). Smaller than body text to indicate secondary/supplementary information.

fontWeight.$description: tooltip.fontWeight — Tooltip font weight. Medium weight ensures readability at small font size.

lineHeight.$description: tooltip.lineHeight — Tooltip line height. Compact line height for single-line or short multi-line tooltips.

maxWidth.$description: tooltip.maxWidth — Maximum tooltip width (300px). Prevents tooltips from becoming too wide. Content wraps at this width.

offset.$description: tooltip.offset — Tooltip offset from trigger element (8px). Space between trigger and tooltip prevents visual collision.

horizontal.$description: tooltip.padding.horizontal — Horizontal padding inside tooltip (12px). Provides comfortable reading space for short text.

vertical.$description: tooltip.padding.vertical — Vertical padding inside tooltip (8px). Compact vertical padding keeps tooltip visually lightweight.

shadow.$description: tooltip.shadow — Tooltip shadow. Subtle elevation separates tooltip from underlying content.

duration.$description: tooltip.transition.duration — Tooltip transition duration (100ms). Fast appearance prevents perceived lag when hovering.

easing.$description: tooltip.transition.easing — Tooltip transition easing. Smooth deceleration for natural tooltip appearance.

zIndex.$description: tooltip.zIndex — Tooltip z-index. Ensures tooltip floats above other page content.
